summary: This document is an email exchange between Paul Morris and Lesley Groff regarding a request from Jeffrey Epstein for a phone call. Lesley Groff informs Paul about Epstein's request and suggests a time for the call.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is responding to Lesley Groff's email about Jeffrey Epstein's request for a phone call.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is facilitating communication between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein by relaying Epstein's request for a phone call.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual requesting a phone call with Paul Morris.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is communicating with Paul Morris regarding a request from Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is acting on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein by relaying his request to Paul Morris.
Paul Morris is the recipient of a request from Jeffrey Epstein through Lesley Groff.

keyFacts: The email was sent on April 16, 2013.
Lesley Groff is coordinating a phone call between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeffrey Epstein requested to speak with Paul Morris at a specific time.
